items.name: Veg Biryani
items.description: Assorted veggies slow cooked with aromatic basmati rice and spices topped with fried onions served with yogurt raita + achar + papad

items.name: Tariwala Murg
items.description: Chicken thigh with drumsticks marinated with ginger-garlic paste and other spices cooked in flavourful gravy of onion and tomato. Topped with fresh coriander and garam masala.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Vada Pav
items.description: A famous veggie burger from the streets of Mumbai. The patty is made of boiled potatoes mixed with spices, coated in chickpea flour and fried to perfection. This is stuffed in a bun smeared with spicy green chutney and dry garlic chutney. (2 vada pav)

items.name: Chole Chawal
items.description: A classic North Indian dish featuring flavorful chickpea curry served with aromatic steamed rice, creating a hearty and satisfying meal.

items.name: Veg Jaipuri
items.description: A dish from Rajasthan made with a mix of vegetables cooked together with red chili and tomato paste
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Rajasthani Achari Murg
items.description: A flavorful North Indian dish, particularly popular in Rajasthan, featuring tender chicken pieces cooked in a spicy and tangy gravy prepared with pickling spices and yogurt. The term "achari" refers to the use of traditional Indian pickle, giving the dish its distinctive and zesty flavor.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + papad + achar

items.name: Dal Vada
items.description: A savory Indian snack made from ground lentils, mixed with spices and deep-fried to crispy and flavorful perfection, served with chutney. (4 vada)

items.name: Baingan Bharta
items.description: Roasted eggplant that's mashed and cooked with spices, tomatoes, and onions to create a smoky and delicious dish. Served with 2 chapati.

items.name: Malvani Black-eyed Peas Curry
items.description: A flavorful and spicy dish from the Malvan region of India. It features black-eyed peas cooked in a rich and aromatic gravy made with coconut, spices, and kokum for a tangy twist.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Maharastrian Kala Lamb Curry
items.description: A traditional dish made with lamb cooked in a spicy black masala made with a blend of spices and coconut. It's a popular delicacy in the region
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha/rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Sundal
items.description: A popular South Indian snack made with chickpeas and coconut packed with a lot of flavour.

items.name: Maharastrian Masala Bhaat
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic rice dish from the Indian state of Maharashtra. It is made by cooking rice with a blend of spices and vegetables

items.name: Kolkata Masoor Biryani
items.description: A vegetarian biryani variant from Kolkata. It features masoor dal (red lentils) as the main ingredient, cooked with aromatic spices and fragrant basmati rice. It offers a unique and delicious twist on the classic biryani. Served with yogurt raita + papad

items.name: Kolkata Lamb Biryani
items.description: A classic Bengali dish that features succulent pieces of lamb or mutton marinated in spices and yogurt, layered with fragrant rice, and slow-cooked to perfection. It's known for its distinct flavor, often characterized by the use of fragrant spices like cinnamon, cloves, and cardamom, as well as the addition of potatoes. Served with yogurt raita + papad

items.name: Papadi Chaat
items.description: A popular street food of India. Mini puris topped with mashed potato, onion, tomato, spicy green chutney, sweet tangy tamrind chutney, lots of sev and fresh coriander. A dish with a flavour bomb!

items.name: Chicken Tehari
items.description: One pot chicken rice cooked with caramalised onion, tomato, ginger-garlic paste and fresh garam masala

items.name: Veg Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies cooked with chinese sauces and noodles
items.extra: make it special with some veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies and chicken cooked with chinese sauces and noodles.
items.extra: make it special with chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Vada Sambar
items.description: A South Indian dish consisting of deep-fried lentil-based fritters (vadas) served with a flavorful and tangy lentil soup (sambar). (2 vadas)

items.name: Rasam Rice
items.description: A comforting dish from the south of India. Tomato, tamarind, garlic, cumin cooked together with homemade rasam powder for a soupy consistency. Served with rice and papad.

items.name: Malvani Jowari Dhirde
items.description: A gluten-free Maharashtrian pancake made from jowar (sorghum) flour, mixed with onions, green chilies, and spices, then cooked to perfection on a griddle, resulting in a delicious crepe. This dish is served with a side of malvani rassa.

items.name: Kolambi Bhaat
items.description: Flavourful prawns cooked with ginger, garlic, onion and other spices combined with aromatic basmati rice and fresh coriander served wih yogurt dip + papad + achar

items.name: Mini Bread Pakoda
items.description: A bit sized snack made of two slices of bread sandwiching a flavorful potato stuffing, which is then coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried. (4 pieces/1 sandwich)

items.name: Vangi Bhaat
items.description: A traditional Maharashtrian dish made by cooking rice with eggplants and a blend of spices. A flavorful and filling dish.

items.name: Kerala Style Sambar
items.description: A delicious and aromatic South Indian lentil-based stew, known for its unique flavors. It's made with toor dal (split pigeon peas) and a variety of vegetables like drumsticks, okra, and eggplant. The key to its distinctive taste lies in the use of homemade sambar powder, which includes spices like fenugreek, coriander, and red chilies.
items.extra: make it a meal with rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Pathiri Lamb Stew
items.description: A delicious and mildly spiced stew from the South Indian state of Kerala. It's a comforting dish made with tender pieces of lamb cooked in a creamy and aromatic coconut milk-based gravy. The stew is often flavored with spices like cinnamon, cloves, and cardamom, and it includes vegetables such as potatoes and carrots.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 rice flour flatbread + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Rava Unniappam
items.description: A South Indian snack made from semolina (rava), onion, curry leaves and tempered with spices. It's a sweet and fluffy deep-fried dumpling with a crispy exterior and a soft, spongy interior. (7 pieces)

items.name: Pulisherry
items.description: A tangy and mildly spiced yogurt-based dish made with cucumber. The curry includes a mix of coconut, green chilies, and spices blended with yogurt, creating a creamy and flavorful sauce. Served with rice

items.name: Bengali Aloo Dum
items.description: A Bengali dish made by simmering potatoes in a gravy of tomatoes, ginger, garlic and a variety of spices
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Country Chicken (Dak Bungalow)
items.description: Chicken pieces cooked in a rich and mildly spiced gravy with tomatos, onions, and various spices. It also includes potatos, egg, ginger, garlic and fresh herbs.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Aloo Kabli
items.description: It consists of boiled and cubed potatoes (aloo) mixed with cooked chickpeas (kabli or chana) and a medley of spices and chutneys. The dish is typically garnished with chopped onions, tomatos, corriander and a squeeze of lemon, creating a flavorful and tangy combination.

items.name: Bhate Bhat
items.description: A popular Bengali dish made with boiled vegetables and rice. The vegetables are boiled with rice and then taken out of the rice and mashed with either mustard oil or ghee.

items.name: Kashmiri Veg Yakhni Pulao
items.description: A fragrant rice dish cooked with mixed vegetables and a yogurt-based gravy infused with aromatic spices, offering a delightful vegetarian variation of the traditional Kashmiri pulao. Served with salan + papad + achar.

items.name: Lamb Yakhni Pulao
items.description: A delicious and aromatic rice dish that is popular in Indian and Pakistani cuisine. The dish is made with tender lamb that has been slow-cooked in a flavorful broth (yakhni) made with aromatic spices and yogurt. The lamb and yakhni are then combined with fragrant basmati rice and cooked until tender, resulting in a flavorful and satisfying meal. Served with achar + papad.

items.name: Nadur Munji
items.description: A traditional Kashmiri dish made from lotus stem slices coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried until crispy and golden brown.

items.name: Kashmiri Rajma Chawal
items.description: A delicious and aromatic dish from the Kashmiri cuisine. It features red kidney beans (rajma) cooked in a rich and flavorful gravy made with a blend of spices, yogurt and tomatoes.
